comments.author: Sendra.5709
comments.body: I suggest an option to have API keys include your characters’ crafting professions, their crafting level, and recipes. Not just for the two active professions, but also for the inactivated ones as well. This way sites utilizing API keys could allow people to better search through their characters’ recipes and which professions they have.
